04000000 00291414 3B9AC9FF

[03# get diamonds to have max]
04000000 00291414 3B9AC9FF
04000000 0029147C 18FFFCC0

04000000 018A91EC 110006E0

[inf item usage (OFF)]
04000000 018A91EC 4B0002E0

[05# Level up after fight]
04000000 0028C5D0 5284E1F7

[Level up after fight (Off)]
04000000 0028C5D0 2A0003F7

04000000 0028BE00 5284E1F5

[Max Stamina (Off)]
04000000 0028BE00 2A0003F5

04000000 000DD3AC 528000A0

04000000 000DD3AC 7100141F
